markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 4" pfs="Standard">
[Hydraulic Torrent](/Spells.aspx?ID=1562)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Water" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=165" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 336 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Tradition**
[Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Deities**
[Apep](/Deities.aspx?ID=631), [Hei Feng](/Deities.aspx?ID=307), [Jin Li](/Deities.aspx?ID=308), [Kelizandri](/Deities.aspx?ID=690), [Matravash](/Deities.aspx?ID=617), [Obari](/Deities.aspx?ID=356), [Tresmalvos](/Deities.aspx?ID=421)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Area** 60-foot line

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Defense**
Fortitude

</row>

</column>

---

A swirling torrent of water manifests along a straight line, battering creatures and unattended objects in its path and possibly [pushing](/Rules.aspx?ID=451) them away from you. The torrent deals 8d6 bludgeoning damage. Each creature in the area must attempt a basic Fortitude save; unattended objects automatically fail. Creatures and objects that fail are also knocked back 5 feet (10 feet on a critical failure).

---
**Heightened (+1)** The damage increases by 2d6.
name: Hydraulic Torrent

<summary>
Force creatures back with a damaging line of water.
</summary>

The torrent deals 8d6 bludgeoning damage. Each creature in the area must attempt a basic Fortitude save; unattended objects automatically fail. Creatures and objects that fail are also knocked back 5 feet (10 feet on a critical failure). --- Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d6.
